news_header: An elderly Israeli man, Shlomo Mansour, was killed during Hamas's attack on October 7, 2023, and his body is being held hostage in Gaza.
news_original_title: Elderly hostage in Gaza was killed in 7 October attack, Israel says
news_text: Shlomo Mansour, an 86-year-old Israeli man, was killed during the Hamas attack on southern Israel on October 7, 2023. His body is currently held hostage in Gaza. Mansour was abducted from his home in Kibbutz Kissufim, while his wife managed to escape. The Israeli military confirmed his death based on intelligence and said his name is on a list of hostages to be released by Hamas. The ongoing hostage situation has seen 16 Israeli hostages freed in exchange for Palestinian prisoners, but tensions are rising as Hamas threatens to postpone further releases unless certain conditions are met. The Israeli government is determined to recover all hostages, living or deceased.
